main.title: Welcome to my website dedicated to Vincent Van Gogh in the Borinage.
main.presentation: My name is Filip Depuydt, born in Ypres (Belgium) on March 12, 1966, and raised in the picturesque village of Kemmel at the foot of Mount Kemmel.
main.history: In 1991 I moved from West Flanders to the Borinage in the province of Hainaut, and since 2002 I have worked as a guide in the UNESCO World Heritage site of the Grand-Hornu (www.grand-hornu.eu).
main.history2: Since 1991 I have been married to Dominique Mailleux. Together we have two daughters, Mathilde and Odile.
